TEXT.TITLE: FIRST DATA MANAGEMENT <FDMC.O> COMPLETES MERGER
TEXT.BODY: First Data Management co Inc said it has completed a merger into Firsst Data MAnagement Holding co following sharehoplder approval. It said each 100 shares will be exchanged for 1,000 dlrs principal amount of 14.375 pct senior subordinated debentures due June 15, 2002. Reuter
